name: Galactic Story
description:
There was an explosion at your space base, you are a pilot of a spaceship escaping from the planet, you have a choice of three types of different ships that can be upgraded later, then you avoid enemy bullets, lasers and bombs in open space, while trying, at the same time, deal with all offenders and those who are guilty of the death of your planet!

Galactic Story - Top Down Shooter with Bullet-Hell elements, the player is given a choice of three different types of spaceships, each of them is upgraded right during the game, dodging enemy projectiles, the player destroys enemies and collects various bonuses, and having accumulated a powerful explosion scale, the player can destroy everyone in sight.

Game Features:
- TDS + Bullet Hell
- Variety of Enemies
- Nice Visual Style
